author: David Kierznowski
content: Great event, thanks again to everyone who participated.

author: gcardial
content:
By the slides it really must have been a great talk, I wish I could have participated!


Just make a correction: the FUD ppt link is pointing to the pdf!

author: Ronald
content: I hope girls won't run away like in that pic above, then, but only then I could consider such event, ;-) hehe.

author: pdp
content:
gcardial, thanks, it is fixed now. BTW, if you are based in US, you can come to San Hose for OWASP US 2007. I am pretty much covering the same topic plus some extras on the top.

Ronald, heh, they don't run away but run towards. :)
